{{Location Intro|The '''Sanctuary of Surasthana'''|description=<p>{{If Self|Sanctuary of Surasthana|It|The Sanctuary of Surasthana}} is the residence of [[Lesser Lord Kusanali]], the current [[Dendro Archon]]. ==Descriptions==
{{Description|The palace located at the top of Sumeru City. It is believed to be the residence of the current Dendro Archon, "Lesser Lord Kusanali." No one apart from the sages of the Akademiya has ever seen this deity with their own eyes for the last few hundred years.|Original [[Map]] description}}

{{Description|A palace located at the highest point of Sumeru City that is said to be the abode of the current Dendro Archon, Lesser Lord Kusanali. For centuries, under the guidance of the sages, the light of wisdom has shone out from here to illuminate the entirety of Sumeru.|Map description after completing {{Quest|Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises}}}}

== Gameplay Notes ==

* Falling into the void results in the energy of all characters in the team to be drained and a health penalty. 

==Trivia==
===Etymology=== 
* {{lang|Sura|sa=सुर|sa_rm=sura}} means "god" or "deity" and {{lang|sthana|sa=स्थान|sa_rm=sthāna}} refers to "a temple." {{Lang|Surasthana|sa=सुरस्थान|sa_rm=Surasthāna}} can mean "temple," "devotional place" or "residence of God."<ref>Wisdom Library: [https://www.wisdomlib.org/definition/surasthana Surasthana]</ref>
